name: Oneteam Soccer (itch)
description:
Let's play ONETEAM SOCCER. 

【RULE】

All players move together since they're "ONETEAM".

【OPERATION】

1P
Walkㅤㅤ:ㅤWㅤㅤHoldㅤ       :ㅤR
Turn（L）:ㅤAㅤㅤKick        ㅤ:ㅤT
Turn（R）:    D
Backㅤ  ㅤ:ㅤS

※You can see them in [Show Config] in the game.

【SETTING】

You can select the CPU level (beginner, professional, G O D)

・You can choose [1P VS CPU] mode or [1P VS 2P] mode.
・You can choose the time to sit.
